Posts.EditableText: When I choose a web font it doesn't apply this to the text for things like 'continue'. These appear just with a regular default font. Any tips on how to change this.
Posts.HTML: When I choose a web font it doesn't apply this to the text for things like 'continue'. These appear just with a regular default font. Any tips on how to change this.

Posts.EditableText: Try putting this in your game "start" script: [code:2s490u5d]// Change the colour to orange JS.eval ("$('#txtCommandDiv a').css('color', 'orange');") // Change the font to Berkshire Swash JS.eval ("$('#txtCommandDiv a').css('font-family', 'Berkshire Swash');")[/code:2s490u5d] For general stuff about changing the interface, look at this thread. viewtopic.php?f=18&t=5111
Posts.HTML:
Try putting this in your game "start" script:
// Change the colour to orange
JS.eval ("$('#txtCommandDiv a').css('color', 'orange');")
// Change the font to Berkshire Swash
JS.eval ("$('#txtCommandDiv a').css('font-family', 'Berkshire Swash');")


For general stuff about changing the interface, look at this thread.
